# Copilot Instructions for eShopOnWeb

This project uses Azure DevOps. Always check to see if the Azure DevOps MCP server has a tool relevant to the user's request.

## Azure DevOps Integration

When working with Azure DevOps related tasks:
- List projects, work items, builds, repos, test plans, and pipelines
- Query work items using WIQL
- Manage pull requests and code reviews
- Access wiki pages and documentation
- Monitor CI/CD pipelines and builds

Always leverage the Azure DevOps MCP server tools when the user asks about project management, work tracking, or DevOps processes.
